article_title: The left’s coordinated assault on free speech uses leaks, coercion and IRS to suppress conservative groups
article_text:

og.description: By John Daniel Davidson and Brooke Rollins Last week the left-wing British newspaper the Guardian published a trove of funding proposals that were privately submitted to the State Policy Network — a nonprofit group that coordinates state-level efforts to enact free-market reforms — by state-based think tanks. One of the documents was a proposal …
og.title: The left’s coordinated assault on free speech uses leaks, coercion and IRS to suppress conservative groups - Watchdog.org

article.tag: American Legislative Exchange Council,State Policy Network,Texas Policy Network,The Guardian
